snippet.title: Against Great Darkness Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Against Great Darkness is an action roguelite bullet hell with a risk reward system that utilizes retro brick breaking mechanics. Fight your way through the pits of hell. Find interesting synergies in the relics you acquire. Unlock characters, and upgrades to increase your chances.

Wishlist And Follow Against Great Darkness:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2302150/Against_Great_Darkness/
